Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.models

Class Boss

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.models.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.models.ActiveActorDestructible
com.example.demo.models.FighterPlane
com.example.demo.models.Boss
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Boss extends FighterPlane
The Boss class represents a boss enemy in the game. It extends the FighterPlane class and introduces additional features such as move patterns, shield activation, and specialized projectile firing. This class is designed to provide a challenging adversary with unique behavior and mechanics.
See Also:
  • FighterPlane

  • Method Details

    • getMaxHealth

      public int getMaxHealth()
      Gets the maximum health of the boss.
      Returns:
      the maximum health value

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition()
      Updates the position of the boss based on its move pattern. Ensures that the boss stays within valid bounds.
      Specified by:
      updatePosition in class ActiveActorDestructible

    • updateActor

      public void updateActor()
      Updates the state of the boss, including its position and shield status.
      Specified by:
      updateActor in class ActiveActorDestructible

    • fireProjectile

      public ActiveActorDestructible fireProjectile()
      Fires a projectile if the boss is allowed to fire in the current frame.
      Specified by:
      fireProjectile in class FighterPlane
      Returns:
      a BossProjectile if fired, or null otherwise

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage()
      Handles the boss taking damage. Damage is only applied if the shield is not active.
      Specified by:
      takeDamage in interface Destructible
      Overrides:
      takeDamage in class FighterPlane

    • shieldShouldBeActivated

      public boolean shieldShouldBeActivated()
      Determines whether the shield should be activated based on a random probability.
      Returns:
      true if the shield should be activated, false otherwise

    • activateShield

      public void activateShield()
      Activates the shield for the boss and adjusts its shrink factors.

    • deactivateShield

      public void deactivateShield()
      Deactivates the shield and resets related attributes.

    • getFramesWithShieldActivated

      public int getFramesWithShieldActivated()
      Gets the number of frames for which the shield has been active.
      Returns:
      the number of active shield frames

    • isShielded

      public boolean isShielded()
      Checks if the boss's shield is currently active.
      Returns:
      true if the shield is active, false otherwise

    • setShielded

      public void setShielded(boolean shielded)
      Sets the shield status of the boss. Deactivates the shield if set to false.
      Parameters:
      shielded - true to activate the shield, false to deactivate it
